import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"validators"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/validators"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get validator set at a specified height. Validators are sorted first by voting power
(descending), then by address (ascending).

If the `height` field is set to a non-default value, upon success, the
`Cache-Control` header will be set with the default maximum age.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"query","name":"height","description":"height to return. If no height is provided, it will fetch validator set which corresponds to the latest block.","schema":{"type":"integer","default":0,"example":1}},{"in":"query","name":"page","description":"Page number (1-based)","required":false,"schema":{"type":"integer","default":1,"example":1}},{"in":"query","name":"per_page","description":"Number of entries per page (max: 100)","required":false,"schema":{"type":"integer","example":30,"default":30}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  label={undefined}
